entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • JIT: clean up unused throw helpers #93948
    9.0.0
  • Metric description for `http.client.request.duration` does not match the spec #93945
  • [NativeAOT] ld.lld: error: undefined symbol: tls_CurrentThread #93942
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: WASM DotnetHostBuilder assembly loading progress callback #93941
  • Remove net6.0;net7.0 from System.Numerics.Tensors #93939
    9.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] No way to dll export variables? #93936
  • Consider allowing user-defined PrintMembers via extension method for sealed types #93934
  • Optimizing code pattern involving k-register #93932
  • Blazor WASM not aborting socket on HttpClient cancellation #93930
  • [API Proposal]: Add a `Remove` method to `PriorityQueue` #93925
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Extend LoggingGenerator to support scopes #93924
    Future
  • [mono] build fails with newer compiler on windows #93922
    9.0.0
  • How to set GCConserveMemory? #93914
  • Vector128 intrinsic causing crashes on ARM platform. #93912
    9.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Text.RegularExpressions #93927
  • Please provide guidance on how to use DllImportResolver with dlopen on Linux (xref #11901) #93911
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 41 Regressions on 10/18/2023 3:03:02 PM #93926
  • Application hangs on GC under dotnet 6.0 in linux #93909
  • Access to the port 'ttyS0' is denied #93908
  • Test failure GC\\API\\GC\\CollectionCountTest\\CollectionCountTest.cmd #93905
  • [release/8.0][wasm] WBT completely broken on 8.0 branch #93900

Closed

  • The JsonIgnore is being ignored causing property collisions with PropertyNameCaseInsensitive set to true #93903
    8.0.x
  • Test failure BasicEventSourceTests.TestsWrite.Test_Write_T_ETW #88305
    9.0.0
  • Updated RID Plan #83246
    8.0.0
  • Remove usage of InterceptorsPreview feature after updating to 8.0 RC2 SDK #92248
    8.0.0
  • Backlog Clearing Strategy for System.Buffers, System.Numerics, System.Numerics.Tensors, System.Runtime, System.Runtime.Intrinsics #77119
    8.0.0
  • Consider adding "no new features" note to low churn libraries #63401
    8.0.0
  • Future of ISerializable, Serializable attribute and IDeserializationCallback interface #70208
    9.0.0
  • DOTNET_EnableAvx512F=0 does not disable Vector512.IsHardwareAccelerated in WSL #90598
    8.0.0
  • GetFromJsonAsync does not respect MaxResponseContentBufferSize property of HttpClient #71763
    8.0.0
  • .NET 8 slight different result in DateTime.UnixEpoch.AddSeconds(double) #93937
  • Test failure Loader/binding/tracing/BinderTracingTest.ResolutionFlow/BinderTracingTest.ResolutionFlow.cmd #93904
    9.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/Methodical/int64/superlong/superlong_d/superlong_d.dll #93710
    9.0.0
  • Test failure System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.PlatformHandler_HttpClientHandler_SslProtocols_Test.GetAsync_AllowedSSLVersion_Succeeds(acceptedProtocol: Ssl3, requestOnlyThisProtocol: True) #53404
    Future
  • System.Net.Sockets.Tests failing in CI runs #90521
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Implement INumber<T> for vector types and operator interfaces for matrix types. #90781
  • [API Proposal]: File.AppendAllBytes #84532
    Future
  • SafeEvpPKeyHandle abort on macOS #93883
    9.0.0
  • Enable Cors not working as expected #93910
  • Detect the .NET core version at runtime #568
    Future
  • Add a memory budget to the GC #10564
    Future
  • Is there a way to hot reload a particular .wasm module after the runtime already initialised? #91539
    9.0.0
  • System.Net.Sockets.SocketException (10014): The system detected an invalid pointer address in attempting to use a pointer argument in a call #92464
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Move JIT's clang-tidy flags into configuration files and add a root clang-tidy config that disables all checks. #93951
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] WBT: fix failing no-trimming test #93950
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Optimize cancellation handling in Hosting #93949
    area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • Add support for UnsafeAccessorKind.FieldOffset (#45152) #93946
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fix the perf issue in TensorPrimitives.MinMaxCore #93944
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors
  • [release/8.0-staging] [mono] Fix deadlock in static constructor initialization #93943
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-meta-mono, 8.0.x
  • StringBuilder.Replace with ReadOnlySpan<char> #93938
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [mono] Suppress few more MSVC warnings #93923
    area-Build-mono
  • [browser][MT] deputy testing #93920
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Disabling two socket tests #93916
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 9.0.0
  • Add RuntimeInformation.FrameworkDescription test to validate version #93913
    area-System.Runtime
  • Haiku: Initial CoreCLR support #93907
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Draft] Test #93906
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, needs-area-label
  • Keep using RO metadata after creating IMetaDataImporter for PDB reading #93902
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Report StackOverflowException on NativeAOT on Linux #93901
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/8.0][wasm] WBT: Log more info to help debug CI #93899
    arch-wasm, area-Workloads

Merged

  • JIT: Allow initializing blocks without jump targets #93928
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add pod for System.Buffers #93947
    area-Meta
  • Remove use of InterceptorsPreview feature setting now that we build with RC2 #93940
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • Honor JsonSerializerOptions.PropertyNameCaseInsensitive in property name conflict resolution. #93933
    area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Honor JsonSerializerOptions.PropertyNameCaseInsensitive in property name conflict resolution. #93935
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0][wasm] Fix perf pipeline runs #93888
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, perf-pipeline
  • Implement API AppendAllBytes 84532 #93519
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • JIT: fix bug introduced by recent throw helper block changes #93897
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] WBT: Trigger workload integrity check #93898
    arch-wasm, area-Workloads
  • [RISC-V] Test NFloat.IsNegative against its native type equivalent #93734
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, community-contribution
  • Change OpenSslVersion to check for OpenSSL before attempting to determine openssl version #93886
    area-System.Security
  • Fix GitHub_93597 test build #93833
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [RISC-V] Disable not-yet-implemented EnC assertion #93864
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [mono][tests] Disable System.Reflection and System.Threading.Tasks.Parallel tests #93853
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Clean up GenTreeCallFlags, remove INLINE_DATA define #93830
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Haiku: Configuration support #86391
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution, os-haiku

Updated

  • Proposal to add WasmImportAttribute to control wasm module names #93823
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Add initial MaxStack calculation #93244
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Improve System.DirectoryServices interop guidelines conformance #93722
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • Implement the ComVariant struct, the ComVariantMarshaller type, and generator integration #93635
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, source-generator, 9.0.0
  • Light up String.Manipulation APIs with Vector512 codepath #93043
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [IGNORE][wasm] Update Wasm.Build.Tests to build with tfm=net9.0 #93693
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Implement StoreSelectedScalar for Arm64 #93223
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Enable IlasmRoundTrip tests for merged tests #93368
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add new Pipeline for Running Libs Tests with TestReadyToRun #91229
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 9.0.0
  • Use deferred evaluation in ReadOnlyDictionary.Key/Value collections. #93870
    area-System.Collections, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Fix deadlock in static constructor initialization #93875
    area-VM-threading-mono
  • Adding AVX512 path to Base64 encoding/Decoding #92241
    area-System.Buffers, community-contribution, arch-avx512, 9.0.0
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #93874
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • [browser] logging and exit improvements #93472
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Add Capacity property and overloaded TrimExcess #85877
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Don't use File.OpenWrite when trying to overwrite a file in illink/wasm build tasks #93854
    Servicing-consider, area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.1
  • Delete simple quirks left from the `ASG` removal #86726
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][wasm] Pass/receive SIMD arguments by value. #93794
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • avoid allocations for TLS handshake #87874
    area-System.Net.Security, 9.0.0
  • [JIT] Optimize constant V512 vector with broadcast #92017
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Expose TLS details for QUIC connection #93014
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Unblock subsequent requests when an async over sync Dns call runs for too long #92863
    area-System.Net, 9.0.0
  • Start new per-host queue when an async over sync Dns call is cancelled #92862
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 9.0.0
  • [linux-bionic] Skip failing NTLM tests #92830
    area-System.Net.Security, 9.0.0
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization use system ICU #93220
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • [CI ONLY] [NativeAOT] ObjWriter in C# #92705
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono][infra] Enable linux-x64 Mono fullAOT llvm job on extra platforms #92057
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • System.Console cleanup #93828
    area-System.Console, community-contribution
  • [Mono] Enable IL trim for WASM apps by default #90436
    area-Build-mono
  • [NativeAOT] Reflection type refactoring #93440
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Fix regressed file sizes for blazor #92664
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
